name: Beauty Blossom Match3
description:
Beauty Blossom Match3 is an addicting and fun puzzle game, free to play straight. Spend a relaxing day at the lovely flower garden, explore hundreds of beautiful levels, swap the flowers and win!
Features:
● Sweet and fun to play, interesting link blossom game .
● Enjoy beauty of beautiful gardens and stunning graphics on your blossom.
● Link 3 or more flower to clear up and get high score.
● Largest chain connected can bring a special effect jar full of honey and many more surprises.
